pr_title: [risk=no] removing warnings about unchecked method invocation

timeline.bodyText: nit: It's a bit difficult to read ternary statements where each branch is a method call with a bunch of parameters (and only one different). Rather than put the ternary operator in the return statement, I'd probably declare final matchExpression = StringUtils.isBlank(keyword) ? conceptTypes : keyword; Then you can return the same statement either way.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

replies.bodyText:
I might be misunderstanding your statement, but conceptTypes and keyword are not mutually exclusive. If keyword is blank then call:
conceptDao.findConcepts(conceptTypes, ...) otherwise call:
conceptDao.findConcepts(keyword, conceptTypes, ...)
replies.author: freemabd
